sample.test: WEB: /Psalm/ instead of /Psalms/ and also (2): Rahab is either (1) The prostitute who hid Joshua’s 2 spies in Jericho (Joshua 2,6) and later became an ancestor of Jesus (Matthew 1:5) and an example of faith (Hebrews 11:31; James 2:25). (2) Literally, “pride” or “arrogance” — possibly a reference to a large aquatic creature (Job 9:13; 26:12; Isaiah 51:9) or symbolically referring to Egypt (Psalm 87:4; 89:10; Isaiah 30:7).
sample.output: WEB: /Psalm/ instead of /Psalms/ and also (2): Rahab is either (1) The prostitute who hid Joshua’s 2 spies in Jericho (Joshua 2,6) and later became an ancestor of Jesus (Matthew 1:5) and an example of faith (Hebrews 11:31; James 2:25). (2) Literally, “pride” or “arrogance” — possibly a reference to a large aquatic creature (Job 9:13; 26:12; Isaiah 51:9) or symbolically referring to Egypt (Psalm 87:4; 89:10; Isaiah 30:7).
sample.test: WEB: /Period following chapter number: See Ezekiel 10./ A cherub is a kind of angel with wings and hands that is associated with the throne room of God and guardian duty. See Ezekiel 10.
sample.output: WEB: /Period following chapter number: See Ezekiel 10./ A cherub is a kind of angel with wings and hands that is associated with the throne room of God and guardian duty. See Ezekiel 10.
sample.test: WEB: /book names by themselves containing a digit causing error/3 Maccabees: The following books are recognized as Deuterocanonical Scripture by the Greek and Russian Orthodox Churches, but not the Roman Catholic Church: 1 Esdras, The Prayer of Manasseh, Psalm 151, and 3 Maccabees. Note that 1 Esdras and the Prayer of Manasseh are also in an appendix to the Latin Vulgate Bible.
sample.output: WEB: /book names by themselves containing a digit causing error/3 Maccabees: The following books are recognized as Deuterocanonical Scripture by the Greek and Russian Orthodox Churches, but not the Roman Catholic Church: 1 Esdras, The Prayer of Manasseh, Psalm 151, and 3 Maccabees. Note that 1 Esdras and the Prayer of Manasseh are also in an appendix to the Latin Vulgate Bible.
sample.test: TPI: /no ref for 400/ luk olsem dispela i tok long taim ol Asiria i kam kisim planti manmeri i stap long hap not bilong Israel na bringim ol i go kalabus long Asiria. Lukim 2 Kings 15.29. Dispela samting i kamap samting olsem 400 yia bihain long taim ol Dan i kisim taun Lais.
sample.output: TPI: /no ref for 400/ luk olsem dispela i tok long taim ol Asiria i kam kisim planti manmeri i stap long hap not bilong Israel na bringim ol i go kalabus long Asiria. Lukim 2 Kings 15.29. Dispela samting i kamap samting olsem 400 yia bihain long taim ol Dan i kisim taun Lais.
sample.test: TPI: I luk olsem Jon i tok long dispela lo Jisas i bin givim long John 13.34, em i olsem, “Yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela.” (Lukim 1 John 3.23.) Ol i kisim ispela lo bipo tru, taim ol i kamap Kristen. Olsem na em i olpela lo bilong ol. Tasol Jisas yet i bin tok, em i nupela lo, na long lain 8 Jon i tok em i nupela lo tu. em i no nupela lo. Nogat. Em i olpela lo, yupela i bin kisim bipo tru. Dispela olpela lo, em i dispela tok yupela i harim pinis.
sample.output: TPI: I luk olsem Jon i tok long dispela lo Jisas i bin givim long John 13.34, em i olsem, “Yupela wan wan i mas laikim tru ol arapela.” (Lukim 1 John 3.23.) Ol i kisim ispela lo bipo tru, taim ol i kamap Kristen. Olsem na em i olpela lo bilong ol. Tasol Jisas yet i bin tok, em i nupela lo, na long lain 8 Jon i tok em i nupela lo tu. em i no nupela lo. Nogat. Em i olpela lo, yupela i bin kisim bipo tru. Dispela olpela lo, em i dispela tok yupela i harim pinis.

TPI: /markup should be included but reference in fig should not have ref/
21.15 Ezk 40.3, Zec 2.1, Rev 11.1 ensel47HKspan35E Ensel i holim stik gol bilong metaim ol bikpela banis bilong dispela taun.(21.15) i toktok wantaim mi, em i holim stik gol bilong metaim dispela taun wantaim bikpela banis bilong en na ol dua bilong dispela banis. Ol 4-pela sait bilong dispela biktaun i gat wankain mak tasol. Longpela bilong en na bikpela bilong en ol i gat wankain mak stret. Ensel i metaim taun long stik bilong en, na mak bilong taun em inap long 2,200 kilomita.
sample.output:
TPI: /markup should be included but reference in fig should not have ref/
21.15 Ezk 40.3, Zec 2.1, Rev 11.1 ensel47HKspan35E Ensel i holim stik gol bilong metaim ol bikpela banis bilong dispela taun.(21.15) i toktok wantaim mi, em i holim stik gol bilong metaim dispela taun wantaim bikpela banis bilong en na ol dua bilong dispela banis. Ol 4-pela sait bilong dispela biktaun i gat wankain mak tasol. Longpela bilong en na bikpela bilong en ol i gat wankain mak stret. Ensel i metaim taun long stik bilong en, na mak bilong taun em inap long 2,200 kilomita.
